rooms.description: Features traditional Chettinad entrance with stone detailing and floor-to-ceiling windows
Spacious living area with Chettinad-style interior accents and large glass facades providing ample natural light
Modern luxury kitchen designed in line with local building codes, featuring floor-to-ceiling windows for ventilation and light
Multi-functional living space integrating dining and work areas with Vastu-friendly layout and abundant natural lighting

openings.details: Stately entrance door with traditional Chettinad carvings
